ComicInfo.Title: The Curse; Overworked!; The Misfits; ME-262!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Color anthology reprint series of Wally Wood stories, includes:
The Curse: originally published in Vampirella Magazine #9 (Harris, 1971)
Overworked: originally published in Eerie Magazine #131 (Warren, 1966)
The Misfits: originally published in Heroes, Inc. Presents Cannon #1 (self published, 1969)
ME - 262!: originally published in Blazing Combat #4 (Warren, 1966)
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-02 23:35:54. [CVDB26770] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 20:32:06. [Issue ID 41399]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Wallace Wood,Dan Adkins,Wally Wood,Ralph Reese,Wallace Wood,Dan Adkins,Wally Wood,Ralph Reese
ComicInfo.Inker: Wallace Wood,Dan Adkins,Wally Wood,Ralph Reese,Wallace Wood,Dan Adkins,Wally Wood,Ralph Reese
ComicInfo.Colorist: Sam Parsons,Steve Oliff,Ken Feduniewicz,Sam Parsons,Steve Oliff,Ken Feduniewicz
